topic.title: Improvements for Importing Validation Documents Utility

body.p:
Several improvements have been implemented for the Import Validation Documents utility:
The Validation Document Import and Processing window has been improved to allow customization of the font being used in the Imported validation segments list.
Whitespace differences in the changed translatable text will now be identified as changed text.
When importing a *.DOC or *.DOCX document, the performance has been improved by about 50%.
